title: Installation issue: cairo
body:
### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ spack install
...
==> Installing cairo                                                                                                                                                                           
==> No binary for cairo found: installing from source                                                                                                                                          
==> Using cached archive: /gpfs/gpfs1/apps2/librsvg/spack/var/spack/cache/_source-cache/archive/5e/5e7b29b3f113ef870d1e3ecf8adf21f923396401604bda16d44be45e66052331.tar.xz                     
==> cairo: Executing phase: 'autoreconf'                                                                                                                                                       
==> cairo: Executing phase: 'configure'
==> cairo: Executing phase: 'build'                                     
==> Error: ProcessError: Command exited with status 2:
    'make' '-j12'                                                 
                         
7 errors found in build log:                                                                                               
     1087      CC       cairo-boilerplate-ps.lo                                                                            
     1088      CC       cairo-boilerplate-svg.lo                                                                      
     1089      CC       cairo-boilerplate-constructors.lo                                                                
     1090      CCLD     libcairoboilerplate.la                                                                          
     1091    make[5]: Leaving directory `/tmp/pan14001admin/spack-stage/spack-stage-cairo-1.16.0-l7nn57blhplmpswh7cpfleoyijq5wcmn/spack-src/boilerplate'
     1092      CCLD     cairo-sphinx                                                                                       
  >> 1093    /usr/bin/ld: cannot find -luuid                
  >> 1094    collect2: error: ld returned 1 exit status
  >> 1095    make[4]: *** [cairo-sphinx] Error 1                                                                       
     1096    make[4]: Leaving directory `/tmp/pan14001admin/spack-stage/spack-stage-cairo-1.16.0-l7nn57blhplmpswh7cpfleoyijq5wcmn/spack-src/util/cairo-sphinx'
  >> 1097    make[3]: *** [all-recursive] Error 1                                                                            
     1098    make[3]: Leaving directory `/tmp/pan14001admin/spack-stage/spack-stage-cairo-1.16.0-l7nn57blhplmpswh7cpfleoyijq5wcmn/spack-src/util'
  >> 1099    make[2]: *** [all] Error 2
     1100    make[2]: Leaving directory `/tmp/pan14001admin/spack-stage/spack-stage-cairo-1.16.0-l7nn57blhplmpswh7cpfleoyijq5wcmn/spack-src/util'
  >> 1101    make[1]: *** [all-recursive] Error 1
     1102    make[1]: Leaving directory `/tmp/pan14001admin/spack-stage/spack-stage-cairo-1.16.0-l7nn57blhplmpswh7cpfleoyijq5wcmn/spack-src'
  >> 1103    make: *** [all] Error 2
                                                                                                                          
See build log for details:                                        
  /tmp/pan14001admin/spack-stage/spack-stage-cairo-1.16.0-l7nn57blhplmpswh7cpfleoyijq5wcmn/spack-build-out.txt
                                                                    
==> Warning: Skipping build of pango since cairo failed
==> Warning: Skipping build of gobject-introspection since cairo failed
==> Warning: Skipping build of gdk-pixbuf since gobject-introspection failed
==> Warning: Skipping build of harfbuzz since cairo failed
...
```


```yaml
# This is a Spack Environment file.
#                           
# It describes a set of packages to be installed, along with
# configuration settings.
spack:                
  # add package specs to the `specs` list
  specs: [librsvg, openbabel]
  packages:                           
    autoconf:
      buildable: false
      externals:
      - spec: autoconf@2.69
        prefix: /apps2/autoconf/2.69
    automake:
      buildable: false                                                                        
      externals:
      - spec: automake@1.16
        prefix: /apps2/automake/1.16
    bison:
      buildable: false
      externals:
      - spec: bison@2.4.1
        prefix: /usr
    cmake:
      buildable: false
      externals:
      - spec: cmake@3.10.2
        prefix: /apps2/cmake/3.10.2
    findutils:
      buildable: false
      externals:
      - spec: findutils@4.4.2
        prefix: /usr
    fontconfig:
      buildable: false
      externals:
      - spec: fontconfig@2.13.1
        prefix: /apps2/fontconfig/2.13.1
    freetype:
      buildable: false
      externals:
      - spec: freetype@2.9.1
        prefix: /apps2/freetype/2.9.1
    gmake:
      buildable: false
      externals:
      - spec: gmake@3.81
        prefix: /usr
    libxslt:
      buildable: false
      externals:
      - spec: libxslt@1.1.29
        prefix: /apps2/libxslt/1.1.29
    intltool:
      buildable: false
      externals:
      - spec: intltool@0.51.0
        prefix: /apps2/intltool/0.51.0
    perl:
      buildable: false
      externals:
      - spec: perl@5.24.1
        prefix: /apps2/perl/5.24.1
  view: false
```

### Information on your system

<!-- Please include the output of `spack debug report` -->
```console
$ spack debug report
* **Spack:** 0.15.4-1045-678e9f5
* **Python:** 3.4.5
* **Platform:** linux-rhel6-westmere
```

<!-- If you have any relevant configuration detail (custom `packages.yaml` or `modules.yaml`, etc.) you can add that here as well. -->
```console
$ tree ~/.spack
/home/pan14001admin/.spack
├── cache
│   ├── patches
│   │   └── builtin-index.json
│   ├── providers
│   │   └── builtin-index.json
│   └── tags
│       └── builtin-index.json
└── linux
    └── compilers.yaml
$ cat ~/.spack/linux/compilers.yaml
compilers:
- compiler:
    operating_system: rhel6
    extra_rpaths: []
    modules: []
    flags: {}
    target: x86_64
    spec: gcc@9.2.0
    paths:
      fc: /apps2/gcc/9.2.0/bin/gfortran
      cc: /apps2/gcc/9.2.0/bin/gcc
      f77: /apps2/gcc/9.2.0/bin/gfortran
      cxx: /apps2/gcc/9.2.0/bin/g++
    environment: {}
```

### Additional information

<!-- Please upload the following files. They should be present in the stage directory of the failing build. Also upload any config.log or similar file if one exists. -->
* [spack-build-out.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/5262554/spack-build-out.txt)
* [spack-build-env.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/5262556/spack-build-env.txt)
* [config.log](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/5262560/config.log)

<!-- Some packages have maintainers who have volunteered to debug build failures. Run `spack maintainers <name-of-the-package>` and @mention them here if they exist. -->
(No mainainers listed for cairo spack package to `@` mention)
```console
$ spack maintainers cairo
(No output)
```

### General information

<!-- These boxes can be checked by replacing [ ] with [x] or by clicking them after submitting the issue. -->
- [x] I have run `spack debug report` and reported the version of Spack/Python/Platform
- [x] I have run `spack maintainers <name-of-the-package>` and @mentioned any maintainers
- [x] I have uploaded the build log and environment files
- [x] I have searched the issues of this repo and believe this is not a duplicate
